articles.title: India to launch European Space Agency's Proba-3 satellites - Times of India
articles.description: India to launch European Space Agency's (ESA) Proba-3 satellites. Slated for September launch, the satellites will demonstrate precision formation flying between two satellites to create an artificial eclipse. ESA’s Proba-3 consists of two small sate
